statements: SELECT * FROM temperature_data WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT temperature FROM temperature_data ORDER BY time DESC;
SELECT AVG(temperature) FROM temperature_data WHERE location = 'London';
SELECT location, AVG(temperature) AS avg_temp FROM temperature_data GROUP BY location HAVING avg_temp > 20;
SELECT * FROM temperature_data ORDER BY temperature ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM temperature_data ORDER BY time DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT location, AVG(temperature) FROM temperature_data GROUP BY location HAVING AVG(temperature) > 25
SELECT * FROM temperature_data WHERE temperature BETWEEN 20 AND 30 ORDER BY location ASC
SELECT DISTINCT location FROM temperature_data WHERE temperature < 15
SELECT AVG(temperature), MAX(temperature), MIN(temperature) FROM temperature_data
SELECT * FROM temperature_data;
SELECT location, temperature FROM temperature_data WHERE temperature > 25;
SELECT location, date FROM temperature_data ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT AVG(temperature), MAX(temperature), MIN(temperature) FROM temperature_data;
SELECT t.location, ts.avg_temperature FROM temperature_data t JOIN temperature_stats ts ON t.temperature_id = ts.temperature_id;
SELECT * FROM temperature_data WHERE location = 'New York' ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT location, AVG(temperature) AS avg_temp FROM temperature_data GROUP BY location HAVING AVG(temperature) > 25;
SELECT temperature_id, location, date, temperature FROM temperature_data WHERE temperature > 30 ORDER BY date ASC;
SELECT stats_id, avg_temperature, max_temperature, min_temperature FROM temperature_stats WHERE avg_temperature BETWEEN 20 AND 25;
SELECT location, MIN(temperature) AS min_temp, MAX(temperature) AS max_temp FROM temperature_data GROUP BY location;
SELECT * FROM temperature_data WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT temperature, location FROM temperature_data WHERE temperature > 80 ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT MAX(temperature), MIN(temperature) FROM temperature_data WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT AVG(temperature) AS avg_temp, location FROM temperature_data GROUP BY location ORDER BY avg_temp DESC;
SELECT year, AVG(average_temperature) FROM temperature_summary GROUP BY year HAVING AVG(average_temperature) > 70 ORDER BY year ASC;
SELECT date, temperature, location FROM temperature_data WHERE temperature > 25 ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT location, temperature, date FROM temperature_data WHERE location = 'New York' ORDER BY temperature DESC;
SELECT year, average_temperature, highest_temperature FROM temperature_summary WHERE average_temperature < 50;
SELECT location, temperature, date FROM temperature_data WHERE location = 'Los Angeles' ORDER BY date ASC;
SELECT trend_id, trend_description FROM temperature_trends ORDER BY trend_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM temperature_data;
SELECT location, temperature FROM temperature_data WHERE temperature > 20;
SELECT location, max_temperature, min_temperature FROM temperature_data JOIN temperature_stats ON temperature_data.temperature_id = temperature_stats.temperature_id;
SELECT * FROM temperature_data WHERE location = 'New York' ORDER BY date_recorded DESC;
SELECT city, country FROM location_data WHERE city = 'Paris';
SELECT temperature_id, location, temperature, date_recorded FROM temperature_data ORDER BY date_recorded DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT location, date_recorded, temperature FROM temperature_data WHERE temperature > 30 ORDER BY date_recorded ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT MIN(min_temperature), MAX(max_temperature), AVG(average_temperature) FROM temperature_stats;
SELECT location_name, city, country FROM location_data WHERE city = 'New York' ORDER BY location_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM temperature_alerts WHERE alert_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM temperature_records;
SELECT location_id, temperature FROM temperature_records WHERE temperature > 25;
SELECT city, country FROM locations WHERE country = 'USA';
SELECT sensor_type, location_id FROM sensors ORDER BY sensor_id DESC;
SELECT sensor_id, alert_message FROM alerts WHERE alert_time BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01';
SELECT * FROM temperature_records ORDER BY measurement_time DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT location_id, AVG(temperature) FROM temperature_records GROUP BY location_id;
SELECT city, country, COUNT(sensor_id) AS num_sensors FROM locations LEFT JOIN sensors ON locations.location_id = sensors.location_id GROUP BY city, country;
SELECT sensor_type, SUM(measured_value) AS total_value FROM sensors JOIN measurements ON sensors.sensor_id = measurements.sensor_id GROUP BY sensor_type;
SELECT * FROM alerts WHERE alert_time BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
